original_text:
I would hurry to my place of shelter,
    far from the tempest and storm.”
korean_text: 내가 나의 피난처로 속히 가서 폭풍과 광풍을 피하리라 하였도다

sentences.original_text: I would hurry to my place of shelter
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 피난처로 서둘러 갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: far from the tempest and storm
